languages.text: "Первый офицер Версериан. Мне претит сама мысль приказать человеку ваших лет и заслуг заткнуться. Давайте не доводить до ситуации, где я все-таки буду вынужден это сделать".
"First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."
languages.original_text: "Первый офицер Версериан. Мне претит сама мысль приказать человеку ваших лет и заслуг заткнуться. Давайте не доводить до ситуации, где я все-таки буду вынужден это сделать".

traits.locale_text: "First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “韦尔森大副，考虑到你的年龄与资历，如果我命令你闭嘴恐怕就太不体面了。所以，咱们都给对方留点距离，不要逼我走到这一步。”
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森大副，考虑到你的年龄与资历，如果我命令你闭嘴恐怕就太不体面了。所以，咱们都给对方留点距离，不要逼我走到这一步。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Second Werserian. À mon sens, la simple idée d'ordonner à un homme avec vos états de service de la fermer est un anathème. Évitons donc d'en arriver là. »
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Second Werserian. À mon sens, la simple idée d'ordonner à un homme avec vos états de service de la fermer est un anathème. Évitons donc d'en arriver là. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Primer oficial Werserian, la mera idea de ordenar a un hombre de su veteranía y éxito que se calle es anatema para mí. No me obligue a hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Primer oficial Werserian, la mera idea de ordenar a un hombre de su veteranía y éxito que se calle es anatema para mí. No me obligue a hacerlo».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン副操縦士。あなたのような勤続年数の長い人物に黙れと命令することは、俺にとって忌まわしいこと。だから、俺がそうせざるを得なくなるような事態には至らないようにしよう」
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン副操縦士。あなたのような勤続年数の長い人物に黙れと命令することは、俺にとって忌まわしいこと。だから、俺がそうせざるを得なくなるような事態には至らないようにしよう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Erster Offizier Werserian. Allein der Gedanke, einem Mann mit Euren Dienstjahren und Euren Leistungen zu sagen, er soll den Mund halten, ist mir ein Gräuel. Vermeiden wir es also, an den Punkt zu gelangen, indem ich dazu gezwungen bin."
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Erster Offizier Werserian. Allein der Gedanke, einem Mann mit Euren Dienstjahren und Euren Leistungen zu sagen, er soll den Mund halten, ist mir ein Gräuel. Vermeiden wir es also, an den Punkt zu gelangen, indem ich dazu gezwungen bin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."

languages.text: "İkinci Kaptan Werserian. Senin gibi tecrübeli, kıdemli birine sesini kesmesini söylemenin düşüncesi dahi acı verici. Rica ediyorum, beni buna mecbur bırakma."
languages.original_text: "First Officer Werserian. The very thought of ordering a man of your years and service to shut up is anathema to me. So let's not reach the point where I am forced to do so."

traits.locale_text: "İkinci Kaptan Werserian. Senin gibi tecrübeli, kıdemli birine sesini kesmesini söylemenin düşüncesi dahi acı verici. Rica ediyorum, beni buna mecbur bırakma."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
